answers.answer: HI,I think that if you have not been checked for diabetes and thyroid disease, you should discuss this with your doctor. I would suggest a thyroid panel, as well as a 2 hour oral glucose tolerance test. If they are totally normal, then your doctor may suggest some other tests taht can be helpful.Take care.

question: I don't know if any of these signs are normal or not. I have found that sometimes if I eat a sugary cereal I feel almost like I have vertigo that is how dizzy I get..I have noticed that I do pee alot , at least once an hr and get woken up because I have to go. I cannot for the life of me loose weight and I am overweight..I do not feel a sudden thirst but once I take a first sip I find myself guzzling what I am drinking..I am moody and find that I can fall asleep great but I cannot stay asleep..Please help me because sometimes I feel as if I am loosing my mind...oh and I also find myself sweating alot
title: diabetes
